Content: Had some issues getting started, it wasn't clear that you have to create an account to login with Google and the trial session crashes the app, but after creating an account and logging in the app is working well and the guided meditation is effective.
App won't open!!! I was using it often and found it super effective before recent update which caused the app to crash and not open. Please fix!!
Absolutely loved this app but now it crashes very time I open it, please fix!!!
App itself, including UI is good. Super buggy though. Constantly asking to login, when already logged in, and then crashing.
